Activity: Log in to the OA system, check emails. Review any pending action items from the week.
Meet with @cio-1 and @coo-1 to provide a weekly summary of progress and adjustments.
Finalize and distribute the weekly progress report to all stakeholders.
Plan and prioritize tasks for the following week based on the current progress.
Conduct a retrospective meeting with the core team to identify lessons learned from the week.
Document key takeaways and action items from the retrospective meeting.
Send out the retrospective notes and action items to the team via email.
Wrap up the week, ensure all documentation is up-to-date, and prepare for the next week.
